text: nenapisikolliri; nivu tira kadime sankhyeyalliddu, bhumiyalli marditaragiddaga hagu janaru nim'mannu nirnamagolisuvarendu anjuttiddaga, nivu krtajnaragirabekendu, avanu (allahanu) nimagondu neleyannodagisidanu hagu tanna neravina mulaka nimage saktiyannu nididanu mattu nimage sud'dha aharavannu puraisidanu
